name: Tabanero - Nero - Robusto
additionalNotes: With a bold flavor and a ring gauge of 54 x 6" Box Press, this cigar is perfect to unwind and relax. The cigar delivers bold, dark chocolate hints accompanied by roasted nuts and tons of sweetness from the Pennsylvania, Nicaragua Ometepe & Jalapa. The satisfying aroma comes from the blend of the San Andres wrapper and Condega. With a nice even burn and gentle wisps of blue smoke, this cigar takes you on a journey into cigar bliss. It has a nice room note that even the most speculative person will find pleasant.
